channel.title: Build an amazing docs site on Doks
channel.description: Recent content in Build an amazing docs site on Doks

item.title: Doks 1.6
item.description: Doks 1.6 is out! This release includes a new Hugo requirement, an improved scripts setup, new development tools, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.4
item.description: Doks 1.4 is now available! This release includes a new shortcode for link cards, improved sidebar navigation, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.3
item.description: Doks 1.3 — our first release of the new year — is here! This release includes restructured dependencies, deduplicated Bootstrap variables, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.2
item.description: Doks 1.2 is out! This release features support for diagrams, extended code blocks formatting, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.0
item.description: Doks 1.0 is here! This release is a restructure release, making Doks more robust, reliable, and flexible.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Doks is a full-featured documentation theme built on top of the Hyas framework. Here you’ll find guides, resources, and references to help you build with Doks.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Doks is a full-featured documentation theme built on top of the Hyas framework. This guide will help you get started with a new project.

item.title: Upgrade Doks
item.description: This guide covers how to update your version of Doks and related dependencies, how to learn what has changed from one version to the next, and how to understand Doks’ versioning system and corresponding documentation updates.

item.title: Upgrade to Doks v1
item.description: This guide will help you migrate from Doks v0.5 to Doks v1. Upgrade Doks You can update your project by following the steps below.

item.title: Project Structure
item.description: This guide will show you how a Doks project is organized and what the different files in your project do.
